q_en: What are the sewing tasks of Premier Sewers?

steps.sql: SELECT st.* FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE wg.name = 'Premier Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks associated with the working group named 'Premier Sewers' by joining the sewing_tasks table with the working_group table on the working_group_id.
